Package hep.aida.ref.dataSet.binner

Interface Summary
BinError Classes implementing this interfaces calculate the plus and minus error on a bin given its entries and height.
Binner A binner is responsible to keep track of the bins statistics for a binned data container in n-dimensions.
 

Class Summary
DefaultBinner The default implementation of a Binner.
EfficiencyBinError Calculates the bin error for efficiency-type histograms
EfficiencyBinner This binner is for efficiency-type of data.
GaussianBinError This class calculates the error on the bin assuming a gaussian distribution.
PoissonBinError This class calculates the error on the bin assuming a Poisson distribution.
